attributes.action: Rename the Atlantic Ocean’The Gulf of Britain’.
attributes.additional_details: With other countries showing their international might and renaming bodies of water it’s about time we, the proud folk of Britain, rose up and take back what is rightfully ours! In renaming the Atlantic Ocean we will show the whole world we are a forced to be reckoned with: and it may bring in more trade and more visitors.
attributes.background: I want Great Britain to be put back on the world stage by renaming the Atlantic Ocean the Gulf of Britain!
